epoch_id","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"canStartNewGame()":{"details":"return true if game can start in the current epoch"},"elapsedSinceEpochStart(uint256)":{"details":"return the time elapsed(in seconds) since the start of the epoch with epoch_id","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"epochEndTime(uint256)":{"details":"return the end time (in human-readable format) of of the epoch"}},"gamingDelay(uint256)":{"details":"return the gaming delay time of an epoch. if no gaming delay during that epoch, returns 0","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"getActiveEpochID()":{"details":"return the ID of the active epoch either the last epoch or the epoch before the last epoch can be the current epoch, since new epoch is created at the time of sixDayEnd of the previous epoch"},"getLastEpochID()":{"details":"return the last epoch ID the last epoch may or may not be the active epoch, since a new epoch is created 1 hour before its start time"},"hasEpochEnded(uint256)":{"details":"return true if the epoch with epoch_id has ended","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"hasEpochStarted(uint256)":{"details":"return true if the epoch with epoch_id has started","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"isEpochActive(uint256)":{"details":"return true if the epoch with epoch_id is the active epoch","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"isRestDay(uint256)":{"details":"return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its rest day","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"isWorkingDay(uint256)":{"details":"return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its working days","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"restDayEndTime()":{"details":"return the end time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch"},"restDayStartTime()":{"details":"return the start time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch"},"setEpoch_0()":{"details":"sets epoch 0"},"setNewEpoch()":{"details":"creates a new epoch, the ID of which is total number of epochs - 1 This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch ends in order to set new epoch"},"timeUntilEpochEnd(uint256)":{"details":"return the time remaining (in seconds) until the end of the epoch with epoch_id","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch"}},"timestampFromDateTime(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"converts date and time in human-readable format to unix timestamp"},"timestampToDateTime(uint256)":{"details":"converts unix timestamp to date and time in human-readable format"},"unlockAndAddDelay(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"adds gaming delay to an epoch This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch runs longer than the intended sixDayEnd","params":{"epoch_id":"the id of the epoch","gamingDelay":"gaming delay time in seconds"}},"workingDayEndTime()":{"details":"return the end time (in unix time) of the WorkingDays stage in the current active epoch"},"workingDayStartTime()":{"details":"return the start time (in _addGamingDelayToEpoch

_epochEndTime(uint256).details: return the end time (in unix time) of the epoch with epoch_id

_epochStartTime(uint256).details: return the start time (in unix time) of the epoch with epoch_id

canStartNewGame().details: return true if game can start in the current epoch

elapsedSinceEpochStart(uint256).details: return the time elapsed(in seconds) since the start of the epoch with epoch_id

epochEndTime(uint256).details: return the end time (in human-readable format) of the epoch with epoch_id

epochLength(uint256).details: return the entire time length (in seconds) of the epoch with epoch_id

epochStartTime(uint256).details: return the start time (in human-readable format) of the epoch with epoch_id

gamingDelay(uint256).details: return the gaming delay time of an epoch. if no gaming delay during that epoch, returns 0

getActiveEpochID().details: return the ID of the active epoch either the last epoch or the epoch before the last epoch can be the current epoch, since new epoch is created at the time of sixDayEnd of the previous epoch

getLastEpochID().details: return the last epoch ID the last epoch may or may not be the active epoch, since a new epoch is created 1 hour before its start time

hasEpochEnded(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id has ended

hasEpochStarted(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id has started

isEpochActive(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is the active epoch

isRestDay(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its rest day

isWorkingDay(uint256).details: return true if the epoch with epoch_id is on its working days

restDayEndTime().details: return the end time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch

restDayStartTime().details: return the start time (in unix time) of the RestDay stage in the current active epoch

setNewEpoch().details: creates a new epoch, the ID of which is total number of epochs - 1 This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch ends in order to set new epoch

timeUntilEpochEnd(uint256).details: return the time remaining (in seconds) until the end of the epoch with epoch_id

timestampFromDateTime(uint256,uint256,ui.details: converts date and time in human-readable format to unix timestamp

timestampToDateTime(uint256).details: converts unix timestamp to date and time in human-readable format

unlockAndAddDelay(uint256,uint256).details: adds gaming delay to an epoch This function should be called by GameManager when the last game in an epoch runs longer than the intended sixDayEnd

workingDayEndTime().details: return the end time (in unix time) of the WorkingDays stage in the current active epoch

workingDayStartTime().details: return the start time (in unix time) of the WorkingDays stage in the current active epoch
